title: CDisplayEx Version 1.9.16 Comic Book Reader for Windows x86/x64
description:
CDisplayEx is a comic book reader based on CDisplay. It is able to read all comic book formats (cbr, cbz, cbt, cb7, pdf, and djvu).  It loads comic books much faster than CDisplay 1.8.

Before CdisplayEx is installed, you will be prompted to install four applications.
When prompted to install Search Protect, click "Decline".
When prompted to install Linkswift, click "Decline".
When prompted to install Mixi.DJ Toolbar, click "Custom installation (advanced)", uncheck "Install the Toolbar including Value Apps (recommended)." and "Set my default search and home page to Conduit Search.", and click Next.
When prompted to install Sendori, click "Custom installation (advanced)", uncheck "Install Sendori", and click Next.

Both the 32-bit and 64-bit versions are included in this torrent:
CDisplayExWin32_1.9.16.exe for 32-bit operating systems
CDisplayExWin64_1.9.16.exe for 64-bit operating systems

1.9.16
+ Fix a small bug in configuration editor that prevents changing scroll size.
